synopsis.text: Miss Monochrome is an original character created by Japanese voice actress Horie Yui. She first appeared as a 3D virtual singer in 2012, performing songs at Horie's concert. Since then, Miss Monochrome has expanded into merchandise and games. According to her backstory, Miss Monochrome loves monochrome styles and dreams of changing the entire world to match her preferred black-and-white aesthetic. In the anime series, she pursues her goal of becoming a top idol in Japan, training hard and striving to win over fans. In the third season, Miss Monochrome continues her idol activities with support from the group Caramel. As her live tour approaches, excitement and expectations build from both Miss Monochrome and her loyal fans. The upcoming concerts represent her chance to realize stardom and spread her monochrome message to the masses.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
